unduwave.analytical_module.analytic_structures
==============================================

.. py:module:: unduwave.analytical_module.analytic_structures

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains functionality for handling files.

   Module to handle various file operations including finding, moving, copying, and deleting files.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   unduwave.analytical_module.analytic_structures.ana_undulator


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: ana_undulator(bEff, periodLength, numPeriods, lengthEndPeriodsRelative=0.0, ebeam=None, thetaObservation=0.0, unduK=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`unduwave.attribute_classes.attributes._attribute_collection`


   Represents a collection of attributes with children.
   This is a class containing attributes as class-members.
   The class members are administered in unison.

   Initialize the attribute collection
